newsitem.title: USA: Biocircuits gets FDA ok for thyroid assay.
newsitem.headline: Biocircuits gets FDA ok for thyroid assay.

text.p: Biocircuits Corp Tuesday said it received clearance from the U.S. Food & Drug Administration to market its Thyroid Stimulating Hormone ("TSH") assay.
The TSH assay to test for thyroid disease will be offered with its immunodiagnostic system to allow testing in physicians' offices and other points of patient care.

Over the past three years, the number of TSH tests performed annually in the United States has increased from nearly 31 million to approximately 49 million, the company said. Approximately 10 million Americans have a thyroid-related condition that requires ongoing immunodiagnostic monitoring.
